verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6099>great<s%> <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H4735>cattle:<s%> and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> was a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H4735>cattle;<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Ataroth, <S%H5852><s%> and <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> and <S%H5247>Nimrah,<s%> and <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh,<s%> and <S%H7643>Shebam,<s%> and <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and <S%H1194>Beon,<s%>

Even the <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> is a <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> have cattle: <S%H4735><s%>

Wherefore, <S%H559>said<s%> they, <S%H518>if<s%> we have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H853>let<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> for a <S%H272>possession,<s%> and bring us not <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> Shall your <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H4421>war,<s%> and shall <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6311>here?<s%>

And <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> <S%H5106>discourage<s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from going <S%H4480>over<s%> <S%H5674><s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> them?
Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> when I <S%H7971>sent<s%> them from <S%H4480>Kadesh-barnea<s%> <S%H6947><s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

For when they went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> they <S%H5106>discouraged<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they should <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>time,<s%> and he <S%H7650>swore,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Surely <S%H518><s%> none of the <S%H376>men<s%> that came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and unto <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> me:

Save <S%H1115><s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenezite,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he made them <S%H5128>wander<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1755>generation,<s%> that had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> was <S%H8552>consumed.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> ye are risen <S%H6965>up<s%> in your fathers' <S%H8478>stead,<s%> <S%H1><s%> an <S%H8635>increase<s%> of <S%H2400>sinful<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> to <S%H5595>augment<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> if ye turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H310><s%> him, he will <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H5117>leave<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and ye shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And they came <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1448>sheepfolds<s%> <S%H6629><s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> for our <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and <S%H5892>cities<s%> for our little ones: <S%H2945><s%>

But <S%H587>we<s%> ourselves will go ready <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H2363><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H518><s%> we have <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> their <S%H4725>place:<s%> and our little <S%H2945>ones<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

We will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> our <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have <S%H5157>inherited<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> we will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them on yonder <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> or <S%H1973>forward;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> is <S%H935>fallen<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> us on this <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4217>eastward.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H518>If<s%> ye will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> ye will go <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4421>war,<s%>

And will <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of you <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H853>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he hath driven <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him,

And the <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> then <S%H310>afterward<s%> ye shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5355>guiltless<s%> before the <S%H4480>LORD,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> and before <S%H4480>Israel;<s%> <S%H3478><s%> and <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> ye have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and be <S%H3045>sure<s%> your <S%H2403>sin<s%> will find you <S%H4672>out.<s%> <S%H853><s%>

Build <S%H1129><s%> you <S%H5892>cities<s%> for your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for your <S%H6792>sheep;<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which hath proceeded <S%H3318>out<s%> of your <S%H4480>mouth.<s%> <S%H6310><s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6680>commandeth.<s%>

Our little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> our <S%H802>wives,<s%> our <S%H4735>flocks,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H929>cattle,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of Gilead: <S%H1568><s%>

But thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> will pass <S%H5674>over,<s%> every <S%H3605>man<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> for <S%H6635>war,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>saith.<s%>

So concerning them <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> will pass with you <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H854><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> every <S%H3605>man<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; then ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> for a possession: <S%H272><s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> they will <S%H3808>not<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you <S%H2502>armed,<s%> they shall have <S%H270>possessions<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>As<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will we <S%H6213>do.<s%>

We <S%H5168><s%> will pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> that the <S%H272>possession<s%> of our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> on this <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> may be ours.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto them, even to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad,<s%> and to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> and unto <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> with the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof in the <S%H1367>coasts,<s%> even the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1769>Dibon,<s%> and <S%H5852>Ataroth,<s%> and <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%>
And <S%H5852>Atroth,<s%> <S%H5855>Shophan,<s%> and <S%H3270>Jaazer,<s%> and <S%H3011>Jogbehah,<s%>
And <S%H1039>Beth-nimrah,<s%> and <S%H1028>Beth-haran,<s%> <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities:<s%> and <S%H1448>folds<s%> for <S%H6629>sheep.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H500>Elealeh,<s%> and <S%H7156>Kirjathaim,<s%>

And <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> and <S%H1186>Baal-meon,<s%> (their <S%H8034>names<s%> being <S%H5437>changed),<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H7643>Shibmah:<s%> and gave other <S%H7121>names<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8034><s%> unto the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H1129>built.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and <S%H3423>dispossessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in it.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> unto <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> and he <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> therein.

And <S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the small <S%H2333>towns<s%> thereof, and <S%H7121>called<s%> them <S%H2334>Havoth-jair.<s%>

And <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7079>Kenath,<s%> and the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof, and <S%H7121>called<s%> it <S%H5025>Nobah,<s%> after his own <S%H8034>name.<s%>
